h3_title: Kang-Jin Star Boss Fight and Guide
content: Even when you get in close range to fight, she has a few close-range lightning attacks to deal with. One starts with another mantra "Spin..." causing her to slash at you with lightning sweeps in two quick attacks, before performing a third attack while yelling "and flush!" This third attack can take the form of a floating downward slash, or creating a cross slash in front of her that moves outward. Whichever it is, a Cloud Step can let you bypass her attack by dodging to the side and then hit her from the flank.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Kang-Jin_Star.md', within the main section titled 'Kang-Jin Star', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Kang-Jin Star' and the sub-subsection 'Kang-Jin Star Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Even when you get in close range to fight, she has a few close-range lightning attacks to deal with. One starts with another mantra "Spin..." causing her to slash at you with lightning sweeps in two quick attacks, before performing a third attack while yelling "and flush!" This third attack can take the form of a floating downward slash, or creating a cross slash in front of her that moves outward. Whichever it is, a Cloud Step can let you bypass her attack by dodging to the side and then hit her from the flank.
